title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Version lifecycle management at scale with AWS Health (SPS326)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Health 进行大规模版本生命周期管理 (SPS326)
abstract: Discover how organizations manage critical lifecycle events including EKS Kubernetes version upgrades and RDS Aurora database updates using AWS Health and ITSM tools. Learn proven strategies for managing these changes at scale, from early detection to change completion. Through customer success stories, see how enterprises have reduced upgrade-related running costs by 60% using the AWS Health toolkit for cluster and database updates. We'll showcase new ITSM integrations with AWS Health, featuring automated change request routing and escalation management for version-critical resources. Join us to define your new organization-wide strategy for version change enablement.
abstract_cn: 了解组织如何使用 AWS Health 和 ITSM 工具管理关键生命周期事件，包括 EKS Kubernetes 版本升级和 RDS Aurora 数据库更新。学习大规模管理这些变更的成熟策略，从早期检测到变更完成。通过客户成功案例，了解企业如何使用 AWS Health 工具包进行集群和数据库更新，将升级相关的运行成本降低 60%。我们将展示 AWS Health 与 ITSM 的新集成功能，包括针对版本关键资源的自动化变更请求路由和升级管理。加入我们，为您的组织制定全新的版本变更启用策略。
